text:
Federal Communications Commission
WASHINGTON
July 1, 1968
Mr. Robert A. Mott
Executive Director
National Educational Radio
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Washington, D. C. 20036
Dear Mr. Mott:
My congratulations on your new assignment
as Executive Director of NER. Radio holds great
potential for substantial contribution to our national
life--and none more than NER.
My best wishes.
Nicholas Johnson
Commis sione r
